Message.Title: I disavow the GOP

Totally alien to these thieves as they need to pay off those that support them. A pox on all of them.

Message.Title: Obama beat rom better than reagan beat carter or bush beat kerry! Up your corpisses!
Message.Msg: When the 2012 vote is expressed as percentages, Obama had 50.8 percent to Romney’s 47.45 percent, while other candidates received 1.75 percent of the vote. Interestingly, Obama’s 50.8 percent represents a higher percentage of the vote than Ronald ReaganRonald Reagan received against Jimmy CarterJimmy Carter in 1980 or George W. BushGeorge W. Bush received in his 2004 re-election victory over John Kerry. Both Reagan in ’80 and Bush in ’04 received 50.7 percent of the popular vote.

Topic.Title: Pravda calls Obama an old style communist whose economic plans will not work!

Message.Msg: "Pravda" means "Truth" in Russian. I'm finding more truth there now than in "our?" "Ministry Of Truth". What we are getting is straight out of Orwell's "1984". When the Ponzi swindle we call "government" collapses I think many of the illiterates that voted for it will realize they've been had too.
